intro.title: hello, i'm jenny! ‚Çä ‚äπ
description: I am a **software engineer, artist, and musician**, incoming @ Microsoft.

Previously, I've worked @ *Amazon, GoodRx*; researched @ [*UW Makeability Lab*](http://makeabilitylab.cs.washington.edu/); taught @ [*Paul G. Allen School*](https://courses.cs.washington.edu/courses/cse351/).
I currently enjoy full-stack engineering, game dev, new media. I will always enjoy dabbling in any form of creative self-expression.

projects.title: jam journal ‚ÇäÀö‚ô¨
description: Import songs and control playback via the YouTube API, take notes on specific songs, and add timestamped or lyric-specific annotations while listening in-app.
For people that analyze lyrics, make ultra-specific playlists, or just want to document their thoughts on music!
projects.footer: typescript, next.js, supabase, sql, youtube api

projects.title: AR RC car racing üèéÔ∏è
description: Multiplayer AR racing game allowing players in the same room to compete on custom, **environment-aware, procedurally-generated racetracks.**
Implemented optimized **3D pathfinding** using octrees and A-star search for obstacle avoidance, and RPCs for synchronizing networked objects.
Built for [VR Capstone](https://courses.cs.washington.edu/courses/cse481v/25sp/) course in a team of 4, using Meta Quest.

projects.title: AR Student Emotion Analyzer üò•
description: Real-time system using emotion classification, live transcription, and AR to provide live instructor feedback during lecture when students are confused.

YOLOv11 detects student faces, while a CNN continuously predicts their emotions to identify spikes in negative emotions. Simultaneously, Faster-Whisper transcribes the lecture, and when confusion spikes occur, the relevant transcript segment is sent to GPT to identify confusing topics.
projects.footer: python, c#, tensorflow, unity, YOLO, whisper, pandas, gpt

projects.title: crown of persuasion üëë
description: Visual novel / 2D platformer where you are a sentient crown that grants your wearer immense persuasive ability, and are responsible for choosing a new village leader.
Implemented dialogue system from scratch, animated player characters, and co-wrote story. Built in 3 weeks for Pirate Game Jam 16, with theme *"you are the weapon."*

projects.title: runring
description: AR game that transforms reality into a platform ring collection game to motivate you to run. Produced game music :p
Built for Snap Spectacles in 24 hours during [Dubhacks 2024](), placing 3rd in Snap side challenge.

projects.title: distributed key-value store
description: Implemented a linearizable, sharded key-value store with multi-key updates and dynamic load balancing for CSE452. Used Paxos algorithm.

projects.title: operating system
description: for anyone

projects.title: shameify
description: Chrome extension that shames you while online shopping, to combat overconsumption. An LLM roasts your ethics based on the product details.
Built for [Treehacks 2024](https://dh24.dubhacks.co/).

projects.title: nobull
description: Combats the spread of misinformation by fact checking verbal claims made in Tiktoks.
Honorable mention @ [Dubhacks 2023](https://dh23.dubhacks.co/).

projects.title: quagga
description: Trivia game web app that acts as a fun icebreaker to foster easier connections between strangers.
Players submit custom questions, answer them, and vote on who they think wrote an answer.
Won Slalom Game Jam side challenge @ [Dubhacks 2022](https://dh22.dubhacks.co/).

projects.title: mob
description: Web app that helps users decide where and when to eat with friends.
Placed in the top 3 finalists for the studio track @ [Dubhacks 2021](https://dh21.dubhacks.co/) and won Facebook Social Good award.
